mailgun_failed_load_api_key: french- Failed to load MailGun API key.
mailgun_failed_load_domain: french- Failed to load MailGun domain.
mailgun_error_send_email: french- Error in sending confirmation email, user registration failed.
confirmation_already_confirmed: french- Registration has already been confirmed.
confirmation_account_successful: french- your account has been successfuly confirmed.
confirmation_resend_fail: french- Internal server error. Failed to resend confirmation email.
item_name_exists: french- An item with name '{}' already exists.
item_error_inserting: french- An error occurred while inserting the item.
store_name_exists: french- A store with name '{}' already exists.
store_error_inserting: french- An error occurred while inserting the store.
user_email_exists: french- A user with that email already exists.
french- A user with that email already exists.
user_not_confirmed: french- You have not confirmed registration, please check your email <{}>.
user_error_creating: french- Internal server error. Failed to create user.
user_registered: french- Account created successfully, an email with an activation link has been sent to your email address, please check.
image_delete_failed: french- Internal server error! Failed to delete image.
avatar_delete_failed: french- Internal server error! Failed to delete avatar.
